track.name: Unconditional Love
comments: this is a classic & why I love 2pac. I can relate to this song so strongly. <3

This track reminds me of sunny Cyprus.
R.I.P 2pac we will never forget you.

"We must remember that tomorrow comes after the dark, so you will always be in my heart, with unconditional love.." RIP 'Pac 

This song has given me much hope since I first became a fan of 2pac when I was 10 years old....

beautiful song 

R.I.P Pac, miss you
